    • Method Detail

      • compareCard

        public int compareCard(int i)
        compareCard method compares two cards and returns 0 if they are equal, 1 if the user's is greater, and 2 if the computer's is greater. -99 is simply in case something goes wrong
        Parameters:
        i - int index
        Returns:
        int representing who won

        userWin method handles moving cards if the user wins the round,
